name: Project Manager
description: Oversees overall project communication, RFIs, and schedule updates.

name: Project Engineer
description: Handles submittals, RFIs, and trade correspondence.

name: Superintendent
description: Manages field operations, daily logs, and punch lists.

name: Subcontractor
description: Sends updates on materials, deliveries, and progress.

name: Executive
description: Views summary-level project analytics and KPIs.
